metadata.title: Thursday, 8th November, 2012
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing when the Government will issue Certificates of Title to the residents of Kaniki Township in Chifubu Parliamentary Constituency who bought council houses.
Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development how many boreholes are earmarked to be sunk in Mulobezi District in 2012.
questions.question_text: ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure): Committee of Supply: Resumption of Debate: (Head 07/01: under consideration): (The Vice President). Heads 07/02, 07/03, 07/04, 07/05, 07/06, 07/07, 07/08, 07/09, 07/10, 07/13, 07/14, 07/15, 07/16, 07/17, 07/18, 07/19, 07/20, 07/21, 07/22, 45/01, 45/02, 45/03, 45/04, 45/05, 45/06, 45/07, 45/10, 45/11, 45/12, 45/13, 45/14, 45/15, 45/16, 45/17, 45/18, 45/19, 08/01, 08/03, 08/04, 08/06, 08/07, 08/08, 09/01 and 10/01 - for consideration. KEY TO HEADS OF EXPENDITURE Head 07    -    Office of the Auditor-General Head 45    -    Ministry of Community Development, Mother and Child Health Head 08    -    Cabinet Office – Office of the President Head 09    -    Teaching Service Commission – Office of the President Head 10    -    Police and Prisons Service Commission – Office of the President
